bibl.title: Heron 'Bearer of Philosophia' and Hermione Grammatike. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Suggests a new reading of a Greek inscription (S.B. XVIII, 13645) on the wrappings of a Roman mummy excavated by W.F. Petrie in the necropolis at Hawara in 1910-11. This reading may be relevant for interpreting the inscription (S.B. I, 5753) of the mummy of Hermione from the same cemetery, now in Girton College, Cambridge.
bibl.seg: MONTSERRAT Dominic, Heron 'Bearer of Philosophia' and Hermione Grammatike. Avec résumé en anglais.

Suggests a new reading of a Greek inscription (S.B. XVIII, 13645) on the wrappings of a Roman mummy excavated by W.F. Petrie in the necropolis at Hawara in 1910-11. This reading may be relevant for interpreting the inscription (S.B. I, 5753) of the mummy of Hermione from the same cemetery, now in Girton College, Cambridge.
